name: DIEGO MP3 SERVER
short_description: DIEGO is a streaming mp3 server written in JAVA. It creates a socket connection on your local machine and listens for HTTP requests. It serves up dynamic m3u playlists which are read by WinAmp, which in turn streams the mp3 to your computer.
